name: Brussels to Prague by EUROPEAN SLEEPER: The very FIRST train!
description:
European Sleeper is now travelling to Prague! Previously a Brussels to Berlin train, it's just been extended to Prague and I was on board the inaugural run! I took a room in a P-class sleeper - a veteran 1950s design - and this spacious private room was the perfect way to spend 16 hours. Come for the unique train and service on board, stay for the brilliant scenery down the Elbe River on day 2! @europeansleeper1156 

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¦ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit
Follow me on Instagram: paul_winginit ¦ https://www.instagram.com/paul_winginit
NEW: Follow me on TikTok: @paul_winginit ¦ https://www.tiktok.com/@paul_winginit

Many thanks to @SimplyRailway for his footage of the 5-berth couchette. His channel link: https://www.youtube.com/@UCSs7KkoAH1hZ08mUIndnRZQ 

See also @doc7austin who made the very first - and very long - video of this same trip (he was in the same sleeper car as I was! See if you can spot me in any of his clips...): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eq2A8ZAoxpM

Mark from @seat61 also made a video on the same trip, in the couchettes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MVkY8QTFVo4 - his website contains excellent info about global rail travel and I use it for inspiration myself!

I made a Bright Trip guide: https://www.brighttrip.com/europebytrain
Merch store: https://wingin-it.teemill.com/collection/all-products/
Preferred VPN: https://surfshark.deals/winginit - promo code WINGINIT for discount
European Sleeper homepage: https://www.europeansleeper.eu/

0:00 Intro
0:52 Brussels-Midi/Zuid
2:50 Our 15-car long European Sleeper train
3:53 Boarding the old P-class 1950s sleeper car (what is going on?)
5:09 Departure from Brussels at 1922
6:04 Welcome drink and menu
6:36 Sleeper car tour
8:15 In-journey reflections
8:55 5-berth couchette tour courtesy of @SimplyRailway 
10:28 Dinner time! (pls get this dining car concept on the road!)
11:30 Amsterdam Centraal - last stop before bed time
12:06 Sleeper bed review
12:55 Germany, Day 2
13:37 Complimentary breakfast
14:33 Elbe river views! Wow
17:23 Arrival into Prague, thanks, and goodbye!
